hicpp-new-delete-operators.description:
Description

This check is an alias for
misc-new-delete-overloads
.
Implements
rule 12.3.1
to ensure
the
new
and
delete
operators have the correct signature.
hicpp-new-delete-operators.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
